heroLang.Start: Simulan ang iyong negosyo sa NFT ngayon!
heroLang.Deploy: I-deploy ang iyong nako-customize na NFT marketplace sa loob ng ilang minuto na kasama ng mga kahanga-hangang feature

takeFullControlLang.Take: Kunin ang buong Kontrol ng NFT Space
takeFullControlLang.Built: Binuo sa maraming chain, NFT marketplace na na-deploy, pagmamay-ari at pinamamahalaan mo
takeFullControlLang.NFTs make: Ginagawa ng mga NFT na pagmamay-ari ang internet dahil maaari kang lumikha ng digital na seguridad. Sinisilip lang namin kung ano ang magiging ekonomiya ng tagalikha at koleksyon ng web 3.0
takeFullControlLang.Deploy on multiple blockchain protocols: I-deploy sa maramihang mga protocol ng blockchain
takeFullControlLang.Accept tokens as payment for NFTs: Tanggapin ang mga token bilang bayad para sa mga NFT
takeFullControlLang.Deploy and manage multiple collections: I-deploy at pamahalaan ang maraming koleksyon

productsLang.Discover marketplaces and games mint and: Discover marketplaces and games mint and collect NFT Items
productsLang.Deploy your or Community NFT MArketplace: Deploy your or Community NFT MArketplace

howToEarnLang.Unlesh: Ilabas ang kapangyarihan ng desentralisadong NFT marketplace
howToEarnLang.Title: As DAO
howToEarnLang.Descrition: Get early access on product , vip louge, newlatters, early opportunities, discount and membership rewards
howToEarnLang.Descrition2: Deploy your NFT marketplace, costumize your fees and themes, create staking opportunities for your costumers
howToEarnLang.Descrition3: Mint your NFTs as $1 for listing/storage fee and 2.5% transaction fee for every purcase
howToEarnLang.Descrition4: Earn from deploying APIs to cached data for marketplace
howToEarnLang.Descrition5: Collect from different marketplace and manage collectibles via Xircus Mobile and Xircus TV apps
howToEarnLang.Descrition6: Earn from helping creators mint their creation

cardsLang.Title: NFTs
cardsLang.Description: Fully customizable NFT collection for single or multiple edition with built-in sale, royalty and split features
cardsLang.Description2: Deploy your personal or community marketplace with a click of a button with built-in stats
cardsLang.Description3: Pay using your favorite crytocurrency configured with your exchange of choice
cardsLang.Description4: Loots boxes of NFT items at a discounted price
cardsLang.Description5: Deploy staking contracts that your marketplace users can use
cardsLang.Description6: Scheduled drops for your users to easily claim NFTs and tokens
cardsLang.Description7: Premium skins to overide the look of your website anytime
cardsLang.Description8: Use xircus custom domain or your own domains for personalized branding

multipleBlackChainLang.Xircus: Suportahan ng Xircus ang multi-chain deployment para sa pagpili ng Maramihang blockchain

builtInLang.Built-in: Built-in at Add-On na Mga Tampok

incomeCalculatorLang.Owner: Na-configure ng may-ari ang mga bayarin sa transaksyon simula sa 2%
incomeCalculatorLang.example: Halimbawa gamit ang 1,000,000 NFT item Minted. binayaran gamit ang usdc
incomeCalculatorLang.Whats: Ano ang iyong marketplace mint fee
